item.title: The Soggy Bottom Boys - In The Jailhouse Now
item.description:
For Educational Use. Best with GCEA tuned ukuleles (based on the chords charts used). Key of C: C, F, Hawaiian D7, G.
As performed by the Soggy Bottom Boys, transposed up a little more than 1/2 step to the Key of C.
This is another song in the Tampa Bay Ukulele Society Beginner Workbook.
Created 100% on iPad using Luma Fusion. Also using iCab Mobile, Twisted Wave, and Any Font.
The ukulele chords are Chordette for Education, available from ukefarm.com

item.title: The Soggy Bottom Boys - I Am a Man of Constant Sorrow
item.description:
For educational use. I am a Man of Constant Sorrow as used in the movie "O Brother, Where Art Thou?" In the original key: F Major (F, Bb, C).
All rights remain with the artist and music company; any advertisements that appear are for that company--not for this channel.
The ukulele font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com
Created using Keynote (layout, text, & lyrics) Keepvid.com (saving the original YouTube video), Audacity (ripping audio and modifying audio), Preview (working with the transparent "ball and chain"), and iMovie (placing the "ball and chain" and other edits).
